titles.title: Pyramid Lake Paiute Tribe Fish Springs Ranch Settlement Act
A bill to ratify a water settlement agreement affecting the Pyramid Lake Paiute Tribe, and for other purposes.
Pyramid Lake Paiute Tribe Fish Springs Ranch Settlement Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Indian Affairs.

bill.summary:
Pyramid Lake Paiute Tribe Fish Springs Ranch Settlement Act - Ratifies the Fish Springs Ranch Water Rights Settlement Agreement dated May 20, 2007.
Sets forth provisions governing the waiver and retention of claims by the Pyramid Lake Paiute Tribe of Indians and the Secretary of the Interior.
